articles.title: Red, White & Royal Blue's steamy gay trailer sends fans wild - PinkNews
articles.description: After what feels like an eternity, Prime Video has finally dropped the eagerly-anticipated trailer for queer rom com Red, White & Royal Blue.
articles.content:
After what feels like an eternity of edging, Prime Video has finally dropped the eagerly-anticipated trailer for queer rom com Red, White & Royal Blue.
